title: Mobile-Based ADDIE Model Sports Massage Education Course

context.additional_context: Blended education combining theory and practice in smartphone-centric learning environments. Parallel implementation of twice-weekly face-to-face sessions and self-directed learning via mobile apps

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles and key techniques of sports massage with 80%+ accuracy
Learners can practice massage procedures for five major muscle groups using mobile app learning materials
Learners demonstrate proficiency in beginner-level sports massage techniques by achieving 75+ points on formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
